datafield.subfield: With a horse called George along ... 1996:

t.p. (J.C. Burgess) colophon (philosopher-poet, teacher, photographer, and writer of fiction and nonfiction; taught philosophy, writing, and linguistics at universities in U.S.; published articles on social commentary, law, philosophy, angling, and wine making; occasionally practices law in Idaho Falls, Idaho, representing visual and literary artists; officer in Group Caldera)
